P003587.project_name: Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Project

project_abstract.cdata: The overall project objective is to improve health and productivity of the poorest and most needy inhabitants of rural China by increasing coverage of water supply, supported by sanitation services, health/hygiene education, technical assistance and training.  The project comprises five components: (a) water supply, including construction of facilities; provision of equipment and utility vehicles; continuation of development, introduction and dissemination of new technologies; (b) sanitation, including construction of facilities in selected demonstration and pilot villages in each project country; provision of the foundation for replicable programs through demonstration; (c) health/hygiene education (HHE) including provision of HHE to all project counties; construction of training facilities; development and dissemination of training and HHE materials; provision of supplies, equipment and utility vehicles; (d) technical assistance and training (TAT) including provision of TAT in management, finance, procurement, training of trainers, and technical aspects of the first three project components at all levels; and (e) institution establishment and project management including construction of project offices; provision of office supplies and equipment; and financing of project management and supervision activities.

P003587.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>农村供水与卫生项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的总体目标是在环卫服务、健康及个人卫生教育、技术援助和培训支持下，扩大供水覆盖面，从而提高中国农村最贫困和最需要帮助居民的健康水平和生产力。本项目设有五个子项目：（1）供水子项目，内容包括建设供水设施、提供设备和车辆、继续开发、引进和传播新技术；（2）环卫子项目，内容包括在各县部分示范村和试点村建设环卫设施、为通过示范进行推广奠定基础；（3）健康及个人卫生教育子项目，内容包括在所有项目县开展健康及个人卫生教育活动、新建培训设施、开发并传播培训教材和健康及个人卫生教育材料、提供物资、设备和车辆；（4）技术援助和培训子项目，内容包括向各级提供管理、财务、采购、师资培训和前三个子项目技术方面的技术援助和培训；（5）机构建设和项目管理子项目，内容包括成立项目办公室、提供办公用品和设备、资助项目管理和监督检查工作。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
